actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a credit against income for maintaining a household a member of which is an elderly dependent of the taxpayer.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers maintaining households to elect a $250 income tax credit for each dependent aged 65 or over who resides in their homes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide individuals a credit against income for maintaining a household a member of which is an elderly dependent of the taxpayer.
